meanings.definition: A field where grains are grown.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted wheat in the grainfield.
meanings.sent2: The combine harvester harvested the barley from the grainfield.
meanings.sent3: The scarecrow in the grainfield told corny jokes to the crows.
meanings.sent4: The golden waves of wheat in the grainfield danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The endless expanse of the grainfield stretched out to the horizon.

meanings.definition: The grains growing in a field.
meanings.sent1: The ripe oats swayed in the grainfield.
meanings.sent2: The sunflowers bloomed brightly in the grainfield.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits played hide-and-seek among the grains in the grainfield.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops kissed the grains in the grainfield, nourishing them.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ripe grains in the grainfield filled the air with sweetness.
